amendment.description: An amendment numbered 55 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funds in this act to carry out Biden Executive Order 13990 (relating to Protecting Public Health and the Environment and Restoring Science To Tackle the Climate Crisis), Executive Order 14008 (relating to Tackling the Climate Crisis at Home and Abroad), Section 6 of Executive Order 14013 (relating to Rebuilding and Enhancing Programs To Resettle Refugees and Planning for the Impact of Climate Change on Migration), Executive Order 14030 (relating to Climate Related Financial Risk), and Executive Order 14057 (relating to Catalyzing Clean Energy Industries and Jobs Through Federal Sustainability).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
